ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Vs. Street Fighter
ComicInfo.Summary: MINISERIES FINALE! The TMNT and Street Fighters stand together against Baxter Stockman and M. Bison at last. Their alliance now set, our heroes’ combined strength should be enough to defeat the bad guys and shut off the Psycho Bomb to save the city. But there’s one variable none of them accounted for: THE SHREDDER has joined the fight! …And his allegiance is to himself.
